tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    job_title VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    purpose TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WorkSchedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeeContacts(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RemoteCommunication (
  comm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  message TEXT,
  communication_date DATE,
  communication_time TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeeContacts(employee_id)
);
CREATE TABLE employees ( employee_id INT, first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(20) );
CREATE TABLE departments ( department_id INT, department_name VARCHAR(50), manager_id INT, location_id INT );
CREATE TABLE schedules ( schedule_id INT, employee_id INT, day_of_week VARCHAR(10), start_time TIME, end_time TIME );
CREATE TABLE locations ( location_id INT, address VARCHAR(100), city VARCHAR(50), state VARCHAR(20), zip_code VARCHAR(10) );

CREATE TABLE addresses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    address_line VARCHAR,
    city VARCHAR,
    state VARCHAR,
    postal_code VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE work_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR,
    organizer_id INT
);
